translation.en: Hmm, pretty sure there was more to that. [sighs]
[in masculine voice] Now, through the miracle of my amazing superpowers,
translation.zh: 现在 通过我神奇的超能力

translation.en: let us move forward 20 years to the modern day
translation.zh: 让我们快进二十年进入现代社会

translation.en: through my nipples of the future!
translation.zh: 让我们快进二十年进入现代社会 看我的时间旅行奶嘴！

translation.en: ♪ One bottle of root beer On the wall ♪
Sheesh. Twenty years later, -and he finally finishes that stupid song. -[toilet flushes]
translation.zh: 苍天啊 唱了二十年终于唱完了

translation.en: [Heffer] Is it time, Rocko? [Rocko] Almost! Are the snacks ready?
translation.zh: 差不多了！零食准备好了吗？
菲尔伯特！我准备好观影区

translation.en: Mmm! Sofa snacks are looking good today!
translation.zh: 今天的沙发零食看起来不错！

translation.en: Hmm. A little to the right.

translation.zh: 啊 烂透了 太远了！

translation.en: [Rocko] Almost there, fellas! Here I come!
translation.zh: 差不多了 伙计们 我来了！

translation.en: It's time for our favorite show! [screams]
translation.zh: 我们最喜欢的节目开始了！

translation.en: [narrator] The Fatheads, created by Ralph Bighead.
translation.zh: 胖头歪传大头拉尔夫制作

translation.en: We must have watched this 1,000 times by now,
translation.zh: 我们肯定已经看过一千遍了

translation.en: and I still go crazy for it!
[narrator] I wonder what kind of ridiculousness the Fatheads will get into now, eh?
translation.zh: 不知道胖头歪传现在有多么好玩

translation.en: Isn't it great how some things never change?
translation.zh: 有些事永远不变难道不是挺好的吗？

translation.en: My favorite show with my favorite friends.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的节目和最好的朋友

translation.en: Edward Elias Fathead, you pick up that regurgitated foot this instant!
translation.zh: 胖头先生立刻把那个反胃的食物捡起来！

translation.en: But I did it last time!
Hey, why aren't you guys laughing?
-[barks] -Oh, crikey. That was our only tape.
translation.zh: 天哪 这是我们唯一一盘磁带

translation.en: Oh, I bet O-Town is wonderful these days, hey, Heff?
translation.zh: 我打赌欧耶小镇现在一定很好嘿 哈弗？

translation.en: I wonder if anyone misses us.
translation.zh: 不知道有没有人想念我们

translation.en: I would miss you, Rocko. Ooh! Not to mention Chokey Chicken!
translation.zh: 我会想你的 洛克更别提超赞炸鸡了

translation.en: What is that stuck to your butt?
Huh? Oh, hey! It's the remote for the rocket.
translation.zh: 嗯？哦嘿！ 是火箭遥控器

translation.en: Hey, it's got a re-entry button?
translation.zh: 嘿 有一个重返地球的按钮

translation.en: You're telling me that the key to getting us home
translation.zh: 也就是说我们回家的钥匙一直黏在你屁股上

translation.en: has been stuck to your butt for 20 years?
translation.zh: 也就是说我们回家的钥匙一直黏在你屁股上 二十年了？

translation.en: How do you not notice these things?
translation.zh: 你怎么会没有注意到它？

translation.en: Well, it's not like I can see my own butt, Filburt.
translation.zh: 我并不能看见自己的屁股
伙计们？我们正经过地球

translation.en: [Heffer] And what are you trying to say, Filburt?
translation.zh: 你想说什么 菲尔伯特？
你是一个超大码的生长激素！

translation.en: You never pay attention to anything!
-Yeah, sure, Rocko. -Yeah. -Whatever you say. -You don't have to freak out.
translation.zh: -当然 洛克 按你说的做-当然 不要担心
让我们在大自然无忧无虑地嬉戏吧！

translation.en: I don't think we're in the '90s anymore.
Check it out! I got the new O-Phone 8.
translation.zh: 看看 我买了最新的欧耶手机八

translation.en: Big whoop. I just got the new O-Phone 9.
translation.zh: 真稀奇 我买到了最新的欧耶手机九

translation.en: This is a phone? But where are all the buttons?
translation.zh: 这是手机？ 但是按键在哪儿？
（沙拉姆饮料） 准备好沙拉姆一下了吗？
沙拉姆能量饮料！ 具有放射性！

translation.en: But where's the door? Where are the comics?
translation.zh: 但是门在哪儿？漫画又在哪儿？

translation.en: Whoa! This food truck sells pizza tacos!
translation.zh: 哇！这个快餐车卖披萨塔可

translation.en: I got a taco taco inside another taco.
translation.zh: 我买了一个双层塔可夹塔可
这一下 是私人恩怨

translation.en: The 21st century is a very dangerous century.
translation.zh: 二十一世纪是非常危险的一个世纪

translation.en: Who are you talking to, darling?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你在和谁说话？

translation.en: Oh, the neighborhood hasn't been the same since you blasted off into space.
translation.zh: 你被炸飞到宇宙之后这儿变得不一样了

translation.en: We have so much to catch up on!
translation.zh: 我们有很多要学习跟上

translation.en: Here, why don't you watch a little TV, and I'll make you a nice glass of warm milk?
translation.zh: 不如你看会儿电视我给你倒一杯暖暖的热牛奶

translation.en: Yeah, this is just what I need.
I'm gonna find some episodes of The Fatheads.
translation.zh: 让我来找几集胖头歪传

translation.en: We's gonna need some more soda pop or something, Mama.
translation.zh: 我们还需要更多的苏打饮料 妈妈

translation.en: Don't know where they all came from. You must have been busy.
translation.zh: 不知道它们都是从哪儿来的你一定很忙

translation.en: And a one, and a two, and a one, and a two!
Do you know what channel The Fatheads are on?
translation.zh: 你知道胖头歪传在哪个台吗？

translation.en: Ew. Oh. That's been off the air for years now.
translation.zh: 呃哦 已经很多年没播了
是的 亲爱的 联合制作体也不播了

translation.en: People these days only want their cartoons in the, you know, fancy widescreen,
translation.zh: 现在的人只想在酷炫的宽荧幕上看卡通片

translation.en: Oh, it looks like you haven't any groceries.
translation.zh: 看起来你这儿没有日常用品

translation.en: Why don't you come over to our house for lunch?
translation.zh: 不如来我们家吃午饭吧
我们可以互相熟悉熟悉

translation.en: Oh, he'll just be thrilled that you're back!
translation.zh: 他知道你回来一定很惊喜！
-小笨笨-B先生好 -柔音莓莓-B先生好

translation.en: Rubeberg. How are the kids? I... don't know!
translation.zh: -土堡 孩子们好吗？-我...不知道
在认真工作吗 小九？

translation.en: [chuckles] Just scanning the daily doc-Os, Mr. B.
translation.zh: 正在扫描文件 B先生
百分百准确 和往常一样
我们的黄金法则是什么 孩子们？

translation.en: [in singsong voice] Music to my ears!

translation.zh: 我们破产了！我们完蛋了！

translation.en: Panic now. I repeat, panic now.
translation.zh: 请害怕 重复一遍 请害怕

translation.en: -[honking] -Hey, get out of the road, you maniac!
Can't you see I'm driving here?
Come on, come on, come on!
I've got a special surprise planned for lunch.
I bet I can guess what it is.
Mr. Bighead, Nosey of Newschunk News here. How does it feel, knowing your math mistake
translation.zh: 大头先生 我是新闻电视台的诺兹得知您的计算错误让克鲁姆完全倒闭

translation.en: has just taken down all of Conglom-O?
[stammers] What? I haven't made a mistake in 20 years.
translation.zh: 什么？我二十年都没犯过错
我有大头 不会失败！

translation.en: [Nosey] And since Conglom-O makes up 95% of our city's economy, O-Town is doomed.
translation.zh: 由于克鲁姆支撑了全城经济的95%欧耶小镇在劫难逃

translation.en: Oh, hang on a second, folks.
This just in, Ed's boss, Mr. Dupette, has just issued the following statement.
translation.zh: 最新消息 艾德的老板杜培特先生刚刚发表了一下声明
哦不 这听起来很严重

translation.en: Hello. We're here to make room for the new unemployment office.
translation.zh: 您好 我们来给失业办公室腾地方

translation.en: You have 24 hours before we demolish your house.
translation.zh: 将于24小时后候拆毁您的房屋

translation.en: This isn't happening. Say this isn't happening!
translation.zh: 这不是真的！说这不是真的！

translation.en: I must be having a nightmare.
Hi, Mr. Bighead. Long time, no see.
translation.zh: 嗨 大头先生 好久不见

translation.en: Ed, honey, I invited Rocko over for lunch.
translation.zh: 艾德 亲爱的 我请了洛克来吃午饭

translation.en: Excuse me. What's wrong with Mr. Bighead?
translation.zh: 抱歉 大头先生怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, just that his life is crumbling like a dry manure pile in the hot sun
translation.zh: 哦没什么 只是他的人生像大太阳下的干粪堆一样粉碎了

translation.en: and he sees no hope, that's all.
translation.zh: 他看不到任何希望仅此而已

translation.en: I can't watch my favorite TV show, The Fatheads.
translation.zh: 我不能看我最喜欢的电视节目胖头歪传

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, The Fatheads. That's right.
translation.zh: 是的 胖头歪传 是的 你的儿子拉尔夫制作的

translation.en: Your son Ralph made it. Maybe he can help me out?
translation.zh: 是的 你的儿子拉尔夫制作的 也许他能帮我？

translation.en: Even with all the success of The Fatheads, I'm just not happy.
translation.zh: 尽管胖头歪传很成功 我还是不开心

translation.en: I need to get away for a while,
do some real soul-searching, and find the real me.
translation.zh: 我要踏上一段寻找心灵之旅找到真正的自我

translation.en: I packed a fly sandwich for you, dear.
translation.zh: 我给你准备了一个苍蝇三明治

translation.en: Rocko, honey, Ralph went off to find himself years ago.
translation.zh: 洛克 亲爱的拉尔夫几年前离开去寻找自我了
哦 不好意思 我要去看一下烧的土豆泥虫子好了没有

translation.en: I... I have to go check on the mashed potato bugs.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我要去看一下烧的土豆泥虫子好了没有

translation.en: This is terrible! No more Ralph means no more Fatheads.
translation.zh: 这真糟糕没有拉尔夫意味着没有胖头歪传

translation.en: Mr. Bighead, please. There must be something you can do
translation.zh: 大头先生 振作起来你一定能做些什么...

translation.en: to bring them... I mean, him back.
translation.zh: 把它们...我是说把他找回来

translation.en: Your Ralphie needs you. I need you!
translation.zh: 你的拉尔夫需要你 我需要你！这个节目是我的全部寄托！

translation.en: His show is all I have!
translation.zh: 我需要你！这个节目是我的全部寄托！

translation.en: Rocko, an old cartoon isn't going to solve the kinds of problems you have.
translation.zh: 洛克 一部老卡通片不会解决你生活中的问题

translation.en: [gasps] Mr. Bighead, The Fatheads wasn't just a cartoon.
translation.zh: 大头先生 胖头歪传不仅仅是一部卡通片

translation.en: Your son created a cultural icon that resonated with millions of people!
translation.zh: 您的儿子创造出一个文化符号在上百万人心中产生了共鸣

translation.en: There's a huge audience out there clamoring for this show to come back,
translation.zh: 有一大批忠实观众吵着闹着要这个节目回归

translation.en: and whoever gives it to them
translation.zh: 而把这个节目带回给他们的人能赚百万...

translation.en: is going to make millions... no, billions!
translation.zh: 而把这个节目带回给他们的人能赚百万... 不 千万！
洛克 你真是个天才！

translation.en: Ralph can make Conglom-O a new Fatheads special!
translation.zh: 拉夫尔可以为克鲁姆做一个胖头歪传特辑！

translation.en: It'll be a huge hit. It'll save my job, my house, and all of O-Town!
translation.zh: 一定会大卖的 不仅能保住我的工作我的房子 还有整个欧耶小镇！

translation.en: And I can watch my old show again! [grunts]
translation.zh: 我就可以就绪看我的动画片了！

translation.en: They'll never listen to me. I've just been fired!
translation.zh: 可他们绝不会听我的我刚被炒了

translation.en: But you! You're a fan, and today's fans have power!
translation.zh: 但是你！你是一个粉丝如今这世道 粉丝有无限的力量！

translation.en: Rocko, I need you to email-text that ram-toodle-schmuck
translation.zh: 洛克 我需要你写邮件短信给拉姆-特逗-臭鼬-扁豆-跳绳

translation.en: schmeepen-bloop your support to bring back The Fatheads.
translation.zh: 有你们的支持 我们将迎回胖头歪传

translation.en: Or we could just go talk to them.
translation.zh: 或者我们可以直接和老板说

translation.en: Now, Rocko, Mr. Dupette is very, let's say, um, particular.
translation.zh: 洛克 杜培特先生先生是那种怎么说呢 非常特别的人

translation.en: I knew a beaver was gonna kill me someday.
translation.zh: 我知道 河狸早晚是会杀死我的
爷爷 你已经死了 还记得吗？

translation.en: I'll tell you when I'm dead!
translation.zh: 我死的时候会告诉你的！

translation.en: Why, back in my day, when you were dead, you were really dead. Not this...
translation.zh: 在过去 当你死了那就是死了不像这样...

translation.en: Where'd you go, Rocko? Heffer and I went gluten-free,
translation.zh: 洛克 你去哪儿了？哈弗和我已经不含麸质了

translation.en: I've reunited with my lovely wife. Hi, Rocko!
translation.zh: -我和我亲爱的妻子重聚了-嗨 洛克

translation.en: I've upgraded, accessorized, and interfaced my platforms,
translation.zh: 我升级了系统 配置了互动平台加上了重启和遗忘按钮

translation.en: plus reset and forgotten so many passwords,
translation.zh: 我升级了系统 配置了互动平台加上了重启和遗忘按钮 设了好多密码我想我要感染病毒了！
设了好多密码我想我要感染病毒了！

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt your little tea party, but we're only dealing with
translation.zh: 抱歉打断你的茶会但我们需要面对命运的挑战

translation.en: the fate of the entire town right now!
Mr. Bighead and I are gonna bring back The Fatheads.
translation.zh: 大头先生和我要去把胖头歪传带回来

translation.en: Sorry, Heffer promised we'd look after his grandfather's ghost for the afternoon.
translation.zh: 抱歉 哈弗答应了今天下午我们一起照顾他爷爷的鬼魂
爷爷有另一个土地公公

translation.en: [Mr. Dupette] Oh, woe is me! I'm ruined!
I've lost everything but my sweet, sweet, booger jar.
translation.zh: 我已失去一切除了我亲爱的鼻涕罐

translation.en: What more do you people want from me?
translation.zh: 你们这些人还想从我这儿得到什么？

translation.en: It's, um... It's, uh, Ed Bighead, sir.
translation.zh: 我是大头艾德 先生
哦！ 你在这儿干嘛？我记得我刚炒了你！

translation.en: I thought I just fired you!
translation.zh: 你在这儿干嘛？我记得我刚炒了你！

translation.en: Oh, yes, sir. You did, you did, but I, uh--
translation.zh: 是的 先生 你是刚吵了我可是 我...

translation.en: We think we can save your company, Mr. Dupette.
translation.zh: 我们可以拯救你的公司

translation.en: What is that, Bighead? Is that a mouse?
Um, Mr. Dupette, do you think Conglom-O TV could bring back The Fatheads?
translation.zh: 杜培特先生克鲁姆电视可以播放胖头歪传吗？

translation.en: That show sold millions of toys and fruit squishies, didn't it?
translation.zh: 那个节目卖出去了几百万个玩具和水果捏捏包是不是？

translation.en: Yes, I'll bring back The Fatheads.
translation.zh: 好的 我会重放胖头歪传的

translation.en: Why didn't I think of it sooner?
I'll get my people on this right away!
translation.zh: 我马上让我手下的人去做

translation.en: Uh, well, we were thinking we could get Mr. Bighead's son Ralph to make it.
translation.zh: 我们是想让大头先生的儿子拉夫尔继续做

translation.en: After all, he created The Fatheads.
translation.zh: 毕竟 他是胖头歪传的创始人

translation.en: Conglom-O is broke! We might even have to sell
translation.zh: 克鲁姆破产了 我们也许甚至要卖男洗手间的马桶

translation.en: the men's executive washroom toilet to make this thing.
translation.zh: 我们也许甚至要卖男洗手间的马桶 来完成制作

translation.en: My people can do it cheap.

translation.zh: 是的 更新胖头歪传

translation.en: We make many a TV show.
translation.zh: 我们做了很多电视节目
走开 脏脏的小毛孩

translation.en: Make art is easy with computers.
translation.zh: 用电脑进行艺术创造十分简单

translation.en: Bighead, you're re-hired. If this thing flops...
translation.zh: 大头 你又被雇佣了如果这个计划失败了...

translation.en: Oh! This is my last chance, Rocko. This cartoon has to be good.
translation.zh: 这是我最后的机会 洛克这个卡通片一定要做好

translation.en: But, Mr. Bighead, if Ralph doesn't make The Fatheads, the special will flop.
translation.zh: 但是大头先生 如果不是拉夫尔来做这个特辑一定会失败

translation.en: Those guys will ruin The Fatheads!
translation.zh: 那些人会毁了胖头歪传的

translation.en: Okay, Mr. Bighead, Heffer, Filburt and I will go find Ralph.
translation.zh: 好的 大头先生 哈弗 菲尔伯特和我会找到拉夫尔

translation.en: Don't let them release that cartoon!
Little beaver thing! I'm a wallaby.

translation.zh: 感谢你绝妙的主意用胖头歪传拯救欧耶小镇

translation.en: to save O-Town by bringing back The Fatheads.
translation.zh: 感谢你绝妙的主意用胖头歪传拯救欧耶小镇 你想对你可爱的粉丝们说些什么？

translation.en: What do you have to say to your adoring fans?
translation.zh: 你想对你可爱的粉丝们说些什么？

translation.en: Fans? I just wanted to see new Fatheads.
We love Rocko! We love Rocko!
translation.zh: 我们爱洛克！ 爱洛克！

translation.en: I just wanted my show back!
You heard it here first, folks. O-Town is saved!
translation.zh: 最新消息 朋友们欧耶小镇有救了！
大家好 网上的朋友们我是炸鱼条96 和值得信任的自拍杆

translation.en: with my trusty selfie-o-matic cranial attachment.
translation.zh: 大家好 网上的朋友们我是炸鱼条96 和值得信任的自拍杆 颅顶固定

translation.en: We're going on an epic quest to find the great Ralph Bighead.
translation.zh: 我们将踏上一段史诗般的探险寻找伟大的大头拉斐尔

translation.en: [screams] It's too real! The details! Whoa!
Subscribe to my channel to follow our inspirational... [screams]
translation.zh: 订阅我的频道收获激动人心的...

translation.en: Spunky! Get away from that Internet thing!
translation.zh: 离这个上网的东西远一点！它会伤到你的！
离这个上网的东西远一点！它会伤到你的！ （拖把的十小时）

translation.en: I have something to share with you!
translation.zh: 我有好东西要和你分享

translation.en: It's about my little Ralphie. Do you know where he went?
translation.zh: -是关于我的小拉夫尔-你知道他去哪儿了吗？

translation.en: Well, my boy sends picture postcards to his dear mother.
translation.zh: 我的孩子给他亲爱的妈妈寄了明信片
中国 埃及 意大利

translation.en: [Bev] Oh, uh, that's not supposed to be there.
Looks like he's been all over the world.
And this is the last picture I have of him.
translation.zh: 这是他寄来的最后一张

translation.en: Oh, bring back my little tadpole, Rocko.
His mother and father miss him so very much.
translation.zh: 他的妈妈和爸爸都很想他

translation.en: I want to, Mrs. Bighead, but how are we gonna get to all these places?
translation.zh: 大头太太 我很想带他回来但我们不可能把这些地方都去一遍

translation.en: Why don't we just take the rocket?
translation.zh: 为什么不直接坐火箭呢？
我们找到遥控器了 记得吗？

translation.en: Spunky, what is it, boy? Do you know how to find Ralph?
translation.zh: 怎么了？你知道怎么找拉夫尔吗？

translation.en: Did you just lose your remote-controlled flying mechanism?
translation.zh: 你的遥控飞行设备是否刚刚被弄丢？

translation.en: You strike me as the kind of couple that knows a quality drone when you see it.
translation.zh: 你们一看就是那种能一眼认出优质的无人驾驶机的夫妇

translation.en: Let me interest you in our econo-drone.
translation.zh: 让我介绍我们的经济无人驾驶机

translation.en: Excuse me. Have you seen this toad?
translation.zh: 不好意思 你见过这只癞蛤蟆吗？

translation.en: Can't an elephant bathe in peace? You nasty, nasty tourists!
translation.zh: 大象就不能安静地洗个澡吗？你们这些聒噪的游客！

translation.en: Yes, we've seen him. No, we haven't!
translation.zh: -是的 我们见过-不 我们没有

translation.en: Can I go for a ride?
Yes, you can. No, he can't!
translation.zh: -是的 你可以-不 他不能

translation.en: How will we ever find Ralph? I think we're out of places to look.
translation.zh: 我们能找到拉夫尔吗？所有地方都找遍了

translation.en: I think I'm out of witty banter.
translation.zh: 我的诙谐幽默都用尽了

translation.en: I think we're out of batteries.
Pillows, culturally ambiguous pillows, soft and fluffy.
translation.zh: 文化属性模糊的枕头柔软蓬松

translation.en: We're okay. We're okay! We're okay!
translation.zh: 我们很好 我们没事
好好工作 你们这些懒虫

translation.en: Shouldn't they be using pencils or something?
translation.zh: 不应该用铅笔之类的东西吗？

translation.en: Ha! Welcome to the 21st century, Bighead!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到二十一世纪 大头

translation.en: We have the best computers, ja?
translation.zh: 我们有最好的电脑 是吧？

translation.en: We can make anything in a passionless and cheap way.
translation.zh: 我们可以以毫无激情又便宜的方式制作一切想要的

translation.en: I'm sweating, I'm hot, I'm nauseous.
translation.zh: 我在流汗 我好热 我好想吐

translation.en: Oh, now we'll never find Ralph Bighead.
translation.zh: 我们永远都找不到拉夫尔了

translation.en: I'll say. I'm not getting any cell phone reception out here.
translation.zh: 我的手机在这儿没有信号

translation.en: Do you see what I see?
translation.zh: 你们看见我看到的了吗？

translation.en: Fried chicken dancing with pizza slices around an orange soda fountain?
translation.zh: 炸鸡和披萨共舞 在橙子苏打喷泉旁边？
不 我不是说海市蜃楼

translation.en: [familiar deep voice] Would you guys like an ice-cold pop?
translation.zh: 你们想来一个冰冰凉的苏打汽水吗？
你的声音听起来很熟悉...
（胖头歪传汽水） 你是大头拉夫尔

translation.en: We've been looking all over the world for you, Ralph!
translation.zh: 我们走遍了全世界找你
真的？ 真的 我的老天 每一个地方
真的 我的老天 每一个地方

translation.en: Why would you be looking for me?
Well, you see, we've been gone for quite some time--
translation.zh: 我们已经离开好一段时间了...

translation.en: Oh, boy. See, we were floating
translation.zh: 哦天哪 我们在宇宙里漂流了二十年
我们在宇宙里漂流了二十年

translation.en: for the past 20 years... Oh, that's good.
translation.zh: 我们在宇宙里漂流了二十年 味道不错

translation.en: Um, well, what Filburt's trying to say is everything's changed so much
translation.zh: 菲尔伯特想说的是一切都不一样了

translation.en: that I just need one thing that used to be here.
translation.zh: 我只需要一件不变的事情

translation.en: Would you bring back The Fatheads, or at least a special?
translation.zh: 你可以继续制作胖头歪传吗？或者仅仅是一个特辑？

translation.en: Wait! But you're the only one in the world who could--
translation.zh: 但你是世上唯一可以的...拉夫尔！
但你是世上唯一可以的...拉夫尔！ 拉夫尔 等等！

translation.en: Why would I bring back The Fatheads?
translation.zh: 我为什么要继续做胖头歪传？

translation.en: Now I only sell Fatheads freezy-pops. Here, have one.
translation.zh: 我现在只买胖头歪传冰苏打

translation.en: But this doesn't even look like Mr. Fathead.
translation.zh: 但这跟大头先生一点都不像
它们是脱形了 但它们卖得好

translation.en: [over loudspeaker] Get off my truck, Rocko.
If Conglom-O doesn't have a new hit, then your dad will lose his job,
translation.zh: 如果克鲁姆公司没有新的节目大卖你爸爸会失业的

translation.en: but most importantly, your parents will lose their house! [yells]
translation.zh: 但最重要的是你爸妈会失去他们的房子！
谁长出了癞蛤蟆小脚趾？
啊他损伤了我的视网膜

translation.en: [Ralph] I'll do it for my parents,
but since the last time I saw them,
translation.zh: 但自从上次见到他们后

translation.en: Well, what are we waiting for? Let's go!

translation.zh: 罗杰 罗杰？我以为你叫瑞秋

translation.en: I thought your name was Rachel.
Hello! I'm talking to you. Are you listening?
translation.zh: 你好！我在跟你说话你在听吗？

translation.en: That is not the right line.
I am laughing so hard right now. If I had pants, I would be wetting them.
translation.zh: 我笑得肚子疼了如果我穿裤子了 那一定尿湿了

translation.en: Ah, a little fresh air. Good idea.
translation.zh: 一点新鲜的空气好主意

translation.en: Pillows, culturally ambiguous pillows, soft and fluffy.
translation.zh: 文化属性模糊的枕头柔软蓬松

translation.en: I think I broke my leg. You don't have a leg.
translation.zh: -我觉得我腿断了-你根本没有腿

translation.en: Bighead, why did you convince me to hire those idiots?
translation.zh: 大头 你是怎么说服我雇佣这些傻瓜的？

translation.en: We obviously need the creator to do this right!
translation.zh: 我们显然需要原创者拨乱反正！

translation.en: We sent for him. He should be here--
translation.zh: 已经去找他了 应该很快...

translation.en: Bighead, nice to meet you. Cool shoes.
translation.zh: 大头 很高兴认识你鞋子很酷

translation.en: We need you to work your magic.
translation.zh: 我们需要你来创造奇迹

translation.en: Your father will fill you in on all the details.
translation.zh: 你爸会告诉你所有细节要求的

translation.en: [menacingly] Ed, you're still in charge. Make this happen.
translation.zh: 艾德 还是由你负责放手去做

translation.en: This is the most work I've done in years. Good luck, Bigheads!
translation.zh: 这是我这些年做过的最多的工作了大头父子 祝你们好运！

translation.en: Let me know when the special's done!
translation.zh: 特辑做好的时候告诉我一声！

translation.en: But what... what goes on here? Where's my son?
translation.zh: 但是...发生什么了？我的儿子呢？

translation.en: I'm not your son. I'm your daughter, and I'm finally happy.
translation.zh: 我不是你的儿子 而是女儿我终于找到了快乐
是我儿子创作了这个节目

translation.en: There will be no Fatheads special. I quit!
translation.zh: 没有胖头歪传特辑了！我退出！

translation.en: Rachel, I'm sure he didn't mean those things.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 我确定他不是这个意思

translation.en: Wait! Mr. Bighead, I need a Fatheads special!
translation.zh: 等等！大头先生我要看胖头歪传特辑！

translation.en: I can't handle all of this, this... this... this...
Change? Hey, can anybody break a five?
translation.zh: 改变？嘿谁能给我五块零钱？

translation.en: Why don't you go back to the '90s, where you belong?
translation.zh: 你为什么不回到你属于的九十年代？

translation.en: Rocko, how does it feel to have single-handedly brought down Conglom-O
translation.zh: 洛克 单枪匹马地毁掉克鲁姆
以至于整个欧耶小镇是什么感觉？

translation.en: I just wanted my show back.
[all] Down with Rocko! Down with Rocko!
-Down with Rocko! -[woman] Rocko stole my socks!
There he is! That's the dog who brought down O-Town!
translation.zh: 他在这儿！这就是那只毁了欧耶小镇的构！
天哪 洛克你是对的

translation.en: You're the wallaby who brought down O-Town.
translation.zh: 你是那只毁了欧耶小镇的沙袋鼠

translation.en: I'm sure your dad didn't mean all of that.
translation.zh: 我很确定你爸爸不是那个意思

translation.en: No, Rocko, I'm done. I'm not needed here.
translation.zh: 不 洛克 我受够了你们不需要我了

translation.en: I'll go back to selling freezy-pops.
translation.zh: -我要回去卖冰苏打-瑞秋 等等！
-我要回去卖冰苏打-瑞秋 等等！ （请享用）

translation.en: I know! I really wanted another Fatheads freezy-pop.
translation.zh: 我懂 我也很想再来一根冰苏打

translation.en: Oh, Ed, I wish you'd be more open-minded.
translation.zh: 艾德 我希望你的思想可以更加开放

translation.en: I think it's great what Rachel has done.
translation.zh: 我觉得瑞秋做的没什么不好

translation.en: I'm sure she's much more comfortable with herself.
translation.zh: 我确定她现在对自己更加自在了

translation.en: Plus, I just found these shoes in her size.
translation.zh: 另外 我还买到了她的鞋码的鞋子

translation.en: It's not just that, Bev. I've lost my job,
translation.zh: 比夫 不是这样 我丢掉了我的工作 快要丢掉房子然后 拉夫尔变成了瑞秋？

translation.en: I'm losing my house, and now, Ralph is Rachel?
translation.zh: 我丢掉了我的工作 快要丢掉房子然后 拉夫尔变成了瑞秋？

translation.en: I'm suffering from an extreme case of TMC, Too Much Change!
translation.zh: 我正在经历翻天覆地变化的磨难

translation.en: and now I can't even watch The Fatheads again.
translation.zh: 我甚至不能再看胖头歪传了

translation.en: Aww, cheer up, Rocko. There's lots of entertainment to be had.
translation.zh: 振作一点 洛克还有许多别的娱乐方式

translation.en: Don't underestimate the hours of fun we can have making warped selfies!
translation.zh: 不要低估我们扭曲自拍的乐趣

translation.en: Hey, you've gained a little weight, Filburt.
translation.zh: 菲尔伯特 你有点长胖了

translation.en: [Filburt] Hey, shell boy. Don't forget to spawn.
translation.zh: 小壳子 别忘了产卵

translation.en: -[Ed] Who's got little tadpole tootsies? -[rat screams]
At least you'll always stay the same.
Mr. Bighead? Are you on the roof?
translation.zh: 大头先生？你在房顶里吗？

translation.en: Mr. Bighead, I'm not feeling too good, either.
translation.zh: 大头先生 我心里也不好受

translation.en: Oh, Rocko, leave me alone. I'm a failure.
translation.zh: 洛克 我想静静我就是个彻头彻尾的失败

translation.en: I feel like I let everyone down.
You let yourself down, Mr. Bighead.
You can live without the old job, and you can live without your house,
translation.zh: 没有以前的工作和房子你也可以好好生活

translation.en: but you can't live without a relationship with your child.
translation.zh: 但你不能没有和孩子之间的亲情

translation.en: We do not need your wind.
Why are you here, Mr. Whinds of Change?
translation.zh: 你为什么在这儿 风先生？

translation.en: I am here to tell you that embracing change is the key to happiness.
translation.zh: 我是来告诉你们拥抱变化是幸福的秘诀

translation.en: You must go with the whinds of change.
Listen, Mr. Blowhard, I don't like your wind, and I don't like change,
translation.zh: 听着 乱吹先生我不喜欢你的风也不喜欢变化

translation.en: so why don't you just take your bogus breeze and float away?
translation.zh: 何不带着你的小微风飘走呢？

translation.en: Yeah, I don't like change either, Mr. Whinds.
translation.zh: 我也不喜欢变化 风先生

translation.en: I'm also having a hard time.
You see, I was stuck in space for 20 years, and--
translation.zh: 我被困在宇宙里二十年

translation.en: Let me tell you something else philosophical
translation.zh: 让我科普一些其他的哲学道理
来自我最新的网上图书

translation.en: You see, the nature of change is--
Excuse me a moment. I have to take that.

translation.zh: 嗯...是... 什么？好的 当然了

translation.en: Uh, what? Oh, yes, of course.
Rocko, where you been? We've been trying to reach you.
translation.zh: 洛克 你去哪儿了？我们一直在找你！

translation.en: Oh, me? Uh, well, we're here on the roof, and the, uh, whinds of change is here.
translation.zh: 我？我们在屋顶上变革之风也在这儿

translation.en: She did it, Rocko! Rachel finished the Fatheads special!
translation.zh: 她做到了 洛克！瑞秋做好了胖头歪传特辑！

translation.en: They're gonna put it on the air in ten minutes, Rocko.
Come on down to Conglom-O and see it!
Yeah, there's a party, and popcorn,
translation.zh: 这儿有个派对 有爆米花

translation.en: and they're showing the special on a huge screen.
translation.zh: 这儿有个派对 有爆米花 还会在大屏幕上播放特辑

translation.en: Give it back, you fat bovine!
I got more to say, shell-back!
And there's sauce from Bora Bora.
Uh, well, I don't know. I think Mr. Bighead needs me.
translation.zh: 我不知道该不该去我想大头先生需要我

translation.en: We gotta go now, Rock. We're having technical difficulties.
translation.zh: 我们要挂了我们正面临技术难题
给我电话 菲尔伯特！

translation.en: So then I said, "Is that a melon in your pocket, or just a bad case of--"
translation.zh: 然后我说“你口袋里的是甜瓜吗 还是一个...”

translation.en: Rachel finished the Fatheads special, Mr. Bighead.
translation.zh: 瑞秋完成了胖头歪传特辑

translation.en: They're airing it in a few minutes, and they're showing it at Conglom-O.
translation.zh: 几分钟后电视播出在克鲁姆公司也会放映

translation.en: You go, Rocko. You probably made it happen.
translation.zh: 你去吧 洛克是你让它成真的

translation.en: There's no way you'll ever get me to go down there...
Oh, wait. What... what... what are you doing?
Sorry, Mr. Bighead, but you've got a party to attend!
translation.zh: 抱歉 大头先生但你有一个派对有待参加

translation.en: Unhand me! Let me go! Let me go!
Whinds of change, blow us to the premiere party, please!
translation.zh: 变革之风 请把我们吹去首映派对

translation.en: Well, I still had some more whords of whisdom, but okay.
translation.zh: 我还有许多智慧箴言没说算了

translation.en: Oh, that wind came out of the wrong end.
And that's why I decided to have that work done, dear.
translation.zh: 那就是我决定完成它的原因

translation.en: Hey, Rock. You... you brought potatoes?
Cool! [Ed] Get your hands off me!
The first Fatheads special in 20 years
translation.zh: 二十年来第一步胖头歪传特辑即将上映
二十年来第一步胖头歪传特辑即将上映 （胖头歪传）

translation.en: [narrator] Hey, everybody. Who's stuck in a nostalgia hole, huh?
translation.zh: 大家好 谁还在怀旧里不能自拔？

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, meet the Fatheads.
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们有请胖头夫妇
他们太有趣了 不是吗？

translation.en: There appears to be a new Fathead.
There's no baby Fathead. We want the old Fatheads.
translation.zh: 没有胖头宝宝我们要以前的胖头

translation.en: Oh, look, baby Fathead is playing with the vacuum!
translation.zh: 看 胖头宝宝在玩真空机！

translation.en: [narrator] Oh, look, it appears that there's a touching moment
with baby Fathead and his parents. Let's watch.
translation.zh: 胖头宝宝和父母大家请看

translation.en: [Mr. Fathead] Who's the cutest little baby Fathead?
translation.zh: 谁是最可爱的小胖头宝宝？

translation.en: Oh, look, he's damaged my retina.
I just want to thank all the little people.
translation.zh: 我想要感谢所有为之奉献的人

translation.en: Wait a minute. Wait a minute!
Listen to me. This is not right!
This isn't just new Fatheads, it's different Fatheads!
translation.zh: 这不是新的胖头歪传这是完全不同的胖头歪传！
是你改变了它 瑞秋

translation.en: Rocko, let me tell you something.
Let me take this, Mr. Gassy Cloud-Thing, whatever you are.
translation.zh: 让我来 懒懒云先生不论你究竟是什么

translation.en: Rocko, we can't live in the past. We can be grateful for it,
translation.zh: 洛克 我们不能一直活在过去我们可以感激过去

translation.en: but life isn't permanent, and if we don't embrace what's now,
translation.zh: 但生活不是永恒的如果我们不拥抱现在就会错过许多

translation.en: we miss out on a lot of the important stuff.
translation.zh: 但生活不是永恒的如果我们不拥抱现在就会错过许多 许多重要的事情

translation.en: Ooh, let's sing a song about change!
translation.zh: 我们唱一首关于变化的歌吧

translation.en: Hey! Conglom-O profits, free for the taking!
translation.zh: 嘿！克鲁姆收益！免费领取！

translation.en: This is the fruit of capitalist redundancy!
Isn't all of this looting illegal?
translation.zh: 这种掠夺行为不是违法吗？

translation.en: What do you mean? Everybody's happy!
translation.zh: 什么意思？大家都很开心！

translation.en: Rachel, that was terrific. Thank you.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 你做得好极了 谢谢

translation.en: Are you going back to selling Fathead pops?
No, I've got more important things to do now.
translation.zh: 不 我现在有更重要的事要做

translation.en: Ed... This kind of looks like you first thing in the morning.
translation.zh: 艾德...这看起来有点像早上刚起床的你

translation.en: Well, it's your old boy, FishSticks96, at the end of my journey.
translation.zh: 这里是你们的老男孩 炸鱼条96旅行即将结束

translation.en: I hope to someday meet my five loyal subscribers.
translation.zh: 希望终有一天我能拥有五个忠实观众

translation.en: I love you, Grandpa. Eh, you still smell like sweaty eggs.
translation.zh: -我爱你 爷爷-你闻起来像流汗的鸡蛋
多么激动人心的结局让我们采访一下

translation.en: but let's talk to the one who made it all happen,
translation.zh: 多么激动人心的结局让我们采访一下 这件事的促成者

translation.en: Big, how does it feel to send everyone on this amazing journey
translation.zh: 用你的超能力把每个角色送上这次惊人的旅程

translation.en: But I must say, my nipples sure are tired.
translation.zh: 但我不得不说我的奶嘴都很累了

translation.en: Understandably so. Well, there you have it.
translation.zh: 非常理解 就这样吧

translation.en: From the ruins of Conglom-O in O-Town, this is Nosey, signing off.
translation.zh: 来自欧耶小镇克鲁姆公司倒闭的报道我是诺兹 报道结束
